songs.title: Caldonia
songs.lyrics:
Oh, walking with my baby, she got great big feet
Long, lean and lanky and had nothing to eat
But I love her, love her just the same
Crazy about that woman 'cause Caldonia's her name

Caldonia, Caldonia
What makes your big head so hard?
Oh mama, I love her just the same
Crazy about that woman 'cause Caldonia's her name

Oh, walking with my baby, she's got great big feet
Long, lean and lanky and had nothing to eat
But I love her, love her just the same
Crazy about that woman 'cause Caldonia's her name

Caldonia, Caldonia
What makes your big head so hard?
Oh mama, I love her just the same
Crazy about that woman 'cause Caldonia is her name
